cont.entity_a: Perfect size for extra wide screen doors.
Easy to install. Installation is quick, around 15 minutes per door.
cont.entity_b: Difficult installation on steel doors. Installation requires drilling new holes due to hole misalignment.

cont.entity_a: Enclosed screws may strip out; recommend using hex head screws. Comes with all necessary screws. Screws included match existing screw holes.
cont.entity_b: Screws provided are soft and break easily. Some pieces arrived without screws. Comes with mounting screws.

cont.entity_a: Well made and sturdy. Durable and expected to last several years.
cont.entity_b: Flimsy despite being labeled as heavy duty. Rubber is thick and durable. Very sturdy and quality is excellent. Heavy duty and suitable for exterior doors.

cont.entity_a: Product effectively prevents drafts. Works well for sealing gaps and preventing cold air drafts.
cont.entity_b: Great for blocking drafts. Effective at preventing drafts and keeping out insects.

cont.entity_a: High quality as expected from M-D.
Good seal for large, old wooden doors.
cont.entity_b: Includes excess rubber to seal gaps effectively. Good seal and waterproof.
Sturdy design. Metal top holds everything together well.
Rubber sweep holes do not align with predrilled holes in aluminum. Rubber strip is thick, making door operation cumbersome. Rubber band is stiff, affecting door operation.
